refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks if the interface has been defined

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function returns &true; if the interface given by interface_name has been defined, &false; otherwise.

example.title: interface_exists example
example.programlisting:
<?php
// Check the interface exists before trying to use it
if (interface_exists('MyInterface')) {
    class MyClass implements MyInterface
    {
        // Methods
    }
}

?>

refsect1.para: interface_exists will attempt to call &link.autoload; by default, if you don't want interface_exists to call &link.autoload;, you can set the parameter autoload to &false;.
